attributes.action: give ALL ghurka soldiers past and present the exact same treatment for pensions and salary as any other British Soldier
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is disgraceful that some Ghurkas are not being treated the same as others as regards pensions. These men have committed their lives to defending Britain's interests and they should be treated exactly the same as every other soldier.

We owe it to them as a matter of honour and in genuine gratitude.

rejection.details:
HM Government announced changes to these arrangements on 8 March:
http://www.gnn.gov.uk/content/detail.asp?NewsAreaID=2&ReleaseID=269670&print=true
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
